remove the extra 0–3/3–6 month/weekly segments that currently exceed the required count. 2) Build a crisp, first-principles causal chain per line: map inflation/discount-rate dynamics to multiples, link moats/cash flow to valuation resilience, and tie AI/cloud and energy-cash returns to durable upside;
